_xResult.title: An Hour Away Red Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made sleeveless red dress with ruffles to spare
_xResult.longdesc:
This one-of-a-kind little red dress could take you around the world in 7 days and then some. The sophistication of this piece is unmatched and the potential limitless. So boundary breaking is this custom fit gown that you could wear it to brunch, to a bull fight, on a plane ride or to a black-tie event and no one would question your intent. It is breathtaking no matter the time or occasion.

 

This dress is available in a wide variety of colors (see swatches) and can be customized for length. When you order, specify color and preferred length of the skirt. Measure from natural waist to preferred length or indicate "knee length" if you have provided your waist-to-knee measurements in your Balodana measurement profile.

 

You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
